AnimalsLibrary.Description: A Monkey has a very long tail and likes bananas.
A Lion is the king of the jungle.
A Dog is a man's best friend, and has been domesticated from wolves!
Cats are quiet animals that are rumored to have 9 lives!
A Fish lives in the water, and has gills instead of lungs.
Sharks are much larger predatory fish, and are the kings of the ocean.
A mouse is a very small rodent that enjoys eating cheese.
Turtles are very slow animals that have hard shells protecting them.
Snakes are long and narrow animals that can be venomous.
Kangaroos live in Australia, and have power legs to jump.
